member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_GPT
member.summary: Contains information about a drive's GUID partition table (GPT) partitions.

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_GPT.StartingUsableOffset
member.summary: The starting byte offset of the first usable block.

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_GPT.UsableLength
member.summary: The size of the usable blocks on the disk, in bytes.

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_GPT.MaxPartitionCount
member.summary: The maximum number of partitions that can be defined in the usable block.
